meanings.definition: A person who tells jokes or plays pranks.
meanings.sent1: The joker made everyone laugh with their funny jokes.
meanings.sent2: The comedian was known as the joker of the group.
meanings.sent3: The joker at the party had everyone in stitches with their hilarious stories.
meanings.sent4: His friend was a real joker, always ready with a witty remark.
meanings.sent5: The joker's humor brightened up the room and lifted everyone's spirits.

meanings.definition: A playing card, typically depicting a jester, used in some card games.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the player drew the joker from the deck.
meanings.sent2: The joker is a special card in many card games.
meanings.sent3: The joker in the deck had a colorful and whimsical design.
meanings.sent4: The joker card stood out among the other playing cards.
meanings.sent5: The joker's face on the card always brought a smile to the players' faces.

meanings.definition: A wildcard in a deck of cards.
meanings.sent1: In the game, the joker could be used as a wildcard to win.
meanings.sent2: Players were excited to draw the joker as it could change the game.
meanings.sent3: The joker in the deck was like a secret weapon for the players.
meanings.sent4: Using the joker as a wildcard turned the game around in an unexpected way.
meanings.sent5: The joker's presence as a wildcard added an element of surprise to the game.

meanings.definition: A person who is fond of joking.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the joker among her friends for her playful nature.
meanings.sent2: The joker in the group always kept the mood light and cheerful.
meanings.sent3: Being a joker, he could find humor in any situation.
meanings.sent4: The joker's lightheartedness made everyone enjoy their time together.
meanings.sent5: His reputation as a joker made him the life of the party.
